So last night I made a python script to find command pods without reaction wheels and update them with the new SAS code. If anyone's interested I could clean it up and post it. Right now it doesn't handle cfg files with multiple parts but that should be easy to fix.

Edit: I improved it to Handle multiple parts in a cfg file and uploaded it to spaceport.

link to the python file

Backup your KSP files before you use this because I'm not 100% sure it won't mess something up.
